bug.author: iamtrask
bug.description:
Several of the PySyft notebooks are now broken because they rely on a completely separate repository (Which has changed). We need to strip out reliance on Capsule in the following notebooks.
https://github.com/OpenMined/PySyft/blob/master/notebooks/Syft%20-%20Paillier%20Homographic%20Encrypted%20Linear%20Classification%20example%20.ipynb https://github.com/OpenMined/PySyft/blob/master/notebooks/Syft%20-%20Paillier%20Encrypted%20Linear%20Classification.ipynb
Acceptance Criteria:
Remove Capsule dependencies from these notebooks and get them working Move these notebooks to Capsule/notebooks folder and get them working

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/iamtrask>@iamtrask</denchmark-link> , I'd like to take this up.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/raul-jr3>@raul-jr3</denchmark-link> wants to as well - perhaps you guys can each pick one of those notebooks to work with?

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/sriranganathan>@sriranganathan</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/raul-jr3>@raul-jr3</denchmark-link> has there been any progress regarding this ticket? Is there any help that is still needed?
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/taylorperkins>@taylorperkins</denchmark-link> any help is very much appreciated :)

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/raul-jr3>@raul-jr3</denchmark-link> awesome!! Working through getting the dependencies installed now. Is there a particular branch you are working off of? If not, I can create one here locally.
